data.text: Me and a friend went there. The staff is very polite and welcoming. There was fun entertainment every afternoon and the animation team took very good care of us even when going to the clubs I Naama Bay. The food could have been better. The hotels location was very beautiful and so was the beaches and the coral reef. We got what we came for and more. Highly recommended.
data.title: A very successful stay

data.text: the hotel is great! It is very beautiful and clean here. very polite staff, good service. The food is delicious and so are the cocktails! Cool animators and thank you poulla he is a great man and funny great shows. thank you sharm club for a wonderful holiday! and we will be back again in this hotel,,
data.title: Great vacation in this Hotel

data.text:
Very nice hotel with long beach and still good reefs. Food is tasty. Greenery is beautiful with many flowers and trees and also with nice vegetable garden. Hotel workers are very friendly and helpful. Rooms spacious, clean and with comfortable beds. Especially pleasant was peaceful atmosphere. Animators were good not, pressing, quite balanced. In some hotels they are too  clamorous and very noisy.  Still at nights music could be not so loud. For example  skirt dance and etc should have Egyptian mysterious more quiet  music.  We recommend this hotel very much for people who like relaxed peaceful vacation.  We would like to return.  Please maintain reefs. People should be already in reception informed not to touch and not to walk on corals. Some people did !
Also please maintain silent peaceful atmosphere. Thank you very much.
data.title: Enjoyable hotel for peaceful relaxed vacation on good reefs

data.text:
After some hard life period I was looking for a place, where I can find some peace and don't worry about anything.
And this resort was exactly the place I needed. End of February is also the perfect timing for someone like me: it's not too hot (+25 - +27 Celcius), water +22 and a lot of sun.
The hotel is kind of surrounded by the sea, so there are 3 beaches and they are oriented differently, so when it's windy on one side, you can go to another one.
There are also 2 pools, the "warmer" and the "colder" one.

My room is quite large, simple and nicely furnished, it's probably kind of oriental inspired design. There is a locker, which is free of charge.

The local food at the restaurant is a mix of different cousins. Sometimes I wished to have more local dishes. But there was an Egyptian evening that was great.
Also once you can visit the local Lebanese restaurant. One visit is included in the price, but a reservation is needed.

There is also a diving club on the territory, a gym, a beauty salon, spa, souvenir shop and even a tattoo studio. I had a massage, I asked for a harder version and it was perfect!

All the staff are very nice, very friendly and pay attention to you, Once I missed the breakfast and at lunch I was asked, if everything is fine. I think, this is cool.
Also the staff who is working at the territory, take care of the green areas are very welcoming and you also see the clean clothes and shoes. It seems that they have a good work conditions.

I would wish to have some more explanation and maybe a small tour at the beginning. Because some of the thing I discovered at the end. Like the food at the corner, that you don't suffer waiting for dinner 😏
Also some announcement about the evening plans would be very helpful. Because there are some activities, but you learn about it somehow randomly. 

I had an amazing experience there, could recommend it to anybody.
data.title: Great place with all inclusive pension

data.text: Amazing hotel! Delicious food and friendly officers. Animators did not give boredom, there was a rich program. Special thanks to an animator named Poulla.Poulla taught me darts, my mom went to yoga with him, and she was happy too. The rest of the animators are also very nice and friendly, able to find common ground with children.
data.title: I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel
